column1: 73$Attention Deficit Disorder with Hyperactivity$8/14/2011 6:29:29 PM$Reviewer: surferboy
column2: 3-6 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Caregiver) $1$1$3$"This was prescribed by a phyc. at 50 mg qd

column1: to a 5 yr. old.  He still has nightmares
column2: goes into rages and tells you what he will do if he does not get his way.  Every day is a challange. in a second
column3: he will change and become the sweetest boy around
column5: loving to his younger siblings.  He did come from an abusive home and we adopted all 3 boys and they are fine.  He sneaks around at night and of course gets the other 2 in trouble.  When he goes into his rages
column6: I can't tell you how much he has broken.  He is also on Intunir ER 3 mg.  He shakes cannot sleep but will go to sleep in school.  I feel really bad for him"
